Package com.hexaware.dao

Class CustomerDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.CustomerDao
public class CustomerDao extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with the Customer database table.

  • Method Details

    • getCustomerById

      public Customer getCustomerById(int customerId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Retrieves a customer by their ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The customer object if found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given ID is not found.

    • getCustomerByUsername

      public Customer getCustomerByUsername(String userName) throws DatabaseConnectionException, SQLException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Retrieves a customer by their username from the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The customer object if found.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given username is not found.

    • registerCustomer

      public boolean registerCustomer(Customer customer) throws DatabaseConnectionException
      Registers a new customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object to register.
      Returns:
      True if the registration is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

    • updateCustomer

      public boolean updateCustomer(String username, String updateField, String updateValue) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Updates a customer's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer to update.
      updateField - The field to update (e.g., FirstName, LastName, Email, etc.).
      updateValue - The new value for the field.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given username is not found.

    • deleteCustomer

      public boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId) throws DatabaseConnectionException, SQLException, CustomerNotFoundException
      Deletes a customer from the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      CustomerNotFoundException - If the customer with the given ID is not found.

    • getCustomerIdByUsername

      public int getCustomerIdByUsername(String username) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves the customer ID by their username from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer to retrieve the ID for.
      Returns:
      The customer ID if found; returns 0 if no matching customer is found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.
